trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_SEQ_00<tab>Gosetsu is demonstrating uncharacteristic restraint.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_TODO_00<tab>Survey Namai from a safe distance.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the young villager.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_TODO_02<tab>Follow Gosetsu.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_TODO_03<tab>Follow Gosetsu.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_LYSE_000_000<tab>It seems peaceful enough to me...
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Even if there aren't any soldiers in the village, it would be foolish to simply stride in and announce ourselves.

TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_010<tab>Let no man claim that I am reckless. Prudence has ever been my watchword! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─venture closer, if you would, and confirm that there are no soldiers lurking about.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_020<tab>Forgive me, my friend, but unlike Yugiri, I am not made for the shadows.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_LYSE_000_030<tab>Who is this boy, and where is he taking us?
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>Judging from the reactions of the villagers, it's probably for the best that we left.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_040<tab>I do not understand it! Was it not clear that we wished to remain awhile?
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_050<tab>I don't know who you people think you are, but do you have any idea what would happen to us if you were found in our village!?
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_051<tab>Again you address us with unwarranted spite! I have let your impropriety pass until now, but no longer!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_052<tab>Who are you, boy, to speak to me thus? Know you not who I am?

TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_053<tab>(-Isse-)<var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am Isse of Namai─a farmer, like my father before me, and his father before him. I wouldn't expect a man like you to know who I am─but I know you. We all do!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_054<tab>(-Isse-)Lord Kaien's retainer and leader of the rebellion─Gosetsu! Notorious fugitive, wanted dead or alive by the Empire!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_055<tab>Hah hah hah hah hah! Is that what this is all about?
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_056<tab>I am hardly the first man to earn the ire of the Empire. Nor will I be the last.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_057<tab>Was not Namai home to brave and true warriors, who fought beneath our banners for king and country?
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_058<tab>(-Isse-)They fought, and they died. Every last one. And then the imperials came looking for more. Because of them.

TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_059<tab>(-Isse-)They were <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> close to killing us all─to burning our village to the ground. We've only just begun to enjoy some semblance of peace...
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ISSE_000_060<tab>(-Isse-)Never again─never again, do you understand!? We've had enough of you and yours! Whatever it is you're plotting, leave us out of it!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_061<tab>...Hmm. Impassioned as his pleas may be, surely he must know that I cannot leave things as they are.

TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_062<tab>But for now, I shall respect his wishes. We must continue on towards our final destination─the House of the Fierce. Proud headquarters of the Doman Liberation Front.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_063<tab>There is a secret entrance to the north of Namai, by way of a small spring. Come─I will show you!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_LYSE_000_070<tab>This must be the spring!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>And there I was thinking our swimming days were behind us.
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_080<tab>This way, this way! We must dive into the water!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_081<tab>Have no fear, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It is but a short distance. You need not hold your breath for long!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_RESSIANGATEKEEPER_000_085<tab>Kami be praised! I know you!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_090<tab><pant> <pant> Hah hah hah! How invigorating!
TEXT_STMBDA316_02492_GOSETSU_000_091<tab>Congratulations, my friends! You are come to the House of the Fierce!
